member.name: M:NDoc.Documenter.JavaDoc.JavaDocDocumenter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the JavaDocDocumenter class.

member.name: M:NDoc.Documenter.JavaDoc.JavaDocDocumenter.GetTransformFile(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the cached transform file, based upon the specified name. If the file does not exist, it is created and then cached.

member.name: M:NDoc.Documenter.JavaDoc.JavaDocDocumenter.GetCachedXPathDocument
member.summary: Gets the XPathDocument, but caches it and returns the cached value.
member.remarks: GetXPathDocument can be very slow for large Assemblies, so this is designed to speed things up. As long as the XPathDocument does not ever get changed internally by other transforms, this should just speed up the performance of the application.

member.name: M:NDoc.Documenter.JavaDoc.JavaDocDocumenterConfig.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the JavaDocDocumenterConfig class.

remarks.para: The JavaDoc documenter is used to make a set of HTML documentation similar in format and layout to the documentation created by Java's JavaDoc technology.
Due to lack of interest this documenter is not under active development. If you are interested in updating this documenter please contact one of NDoc's Admins.

member.name: P:NDoc.Documenter.JavaDoc.JavaDocDocumenterConfig.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the Title property.
member.remarks: The name of the JavaDoc project.

member.name: P:NDoc.Documenter.JavaDoc.JavaDocDocumenterConfig.OutputDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the OutputDirectory property.
member.remarks: The folder where the root of the HTML set will be located. This can be absolute or relative from the .ndoc project file.

member.name: M:NDoc.Documenter.JavaDoc.JavaDocWorkspace.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Manages the location of the documentation build process
member.param: The location to create the workspace
